name: PAL the Robot
description:
Play as PAL - the friendly bot!

This challenging pixel art platformer brings back retro graphics
and precise game play along with new chip tunes and style.

Join PAL on his adventure to escape Syndicorp's
headquarters and save humanity from their killer droids!

Run, jump and wall slide to navigate through
different locations and increasing difficulty.

Each level has been hand crafted pixel by pixel to give you a
rich environment and atmosphere, combined with some great
16-bit inspired tracks to play along to.

This is a beta for the full game I am working on. All feedback welcome!
Like the Facebook page @ PALtheRobot for updates on the project.
